thread.title: Staci
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Staci

author: Staci
title: Staci
text: I recently purchased a Flowermate mini and the threading is way below the top so I cannot screw on the glass tip. Therefore i cannot use this item. Never used and Ive contacted POTV by email exactly whn I was suppose to which was the day it arrived. I would really like a full refund or exchange would be awesome. First time using yall and so far not impressed except for this email I received is the only reply Ive received so far. Plz contact me!
